column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH: A German tourist was found dead on February 19
column4: 2020 at 1:30 pm in the NORDEN HOUSE
column8: Daun Penh District. ------ The man was named as THORSTEN SCHALLER
column10: 45.------Police concluded that the  death may have been caused by the use of the drugs. A syringes and packets of Roche brand valium were found at the scene.------The deceased’s property was handed over to the Office of the Inspector General at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.------After the investigation
column11: the Bureau of Police took the body to the Taek Thla pagoda in Sen Sok district
